name: RubyDoc.org Tweaks
description:
The styling of this site is HORRENDOUS!  Thank God the markup is relatively simple so it's not TOO hard to adjust.  Hardest part is expanding areas by stealing pixels from other areas.

Anyway, I've done a quick hack job to remove those as-n-ne narrow, fixed columns!
